body_html: @zou3519 grad_fn represents a form of parameterized gradient function. It probably should not be accessible publicly, but I don't know the design decisions taken. There seems to be a detailed writeup in torch/csrc/autograd/functions.h.

body: @zou3519 `grad_fn` represents a form of parameterized gradient function. It probably should not be accessible publicly, but I don't know the design decisions taken. There seems to be a detailed writeup in `torch/csrc/autograd/functions.h`.
